verbose_text: We show that several compounds commonly encountered by honey bees (fumagillin, Pristine, quercetin) significantly increased honey bee mortality due to ivermectin and significantly reduced the LC 50 of ivermectin suggesting that they may interfere with transporter function.
evidence: fumagillin, Pristine, quercetin) significantly increased honey bee mortality due to ivermectin and significantly reduced the LC 50  of ivermectin
